                     </div>
                      </div>
                      <div>
                        <h4>Parameters</h4>
                        <table class="graybox">
                          <tbody>
                            <tr>
                              <td>
                                <code>
                                <em>attributesEndpoint</em>
                                </code>
                              </td>
                              <td>
                                <div>
                                  <p>URL to where the certificate attributes are available</p
